sub_title: Legal Translator Dutch-English at JMS Textservice BV
summary:
Legal translator in the Dutch-English language combination at legal translation agency JMS Textservice. I specialize in translating and editing procedural documents and legal correspondence. The key to translating legal documents is the ability to distil the author's original intention and transferring that intention and the right sentiment and powers of persuasion to the target language.

At legal translation agency JMS Textservice I translate and edit legal, financial and other documents from Dutch into English and from English into Dutch. For more information or a quote for your translation job, contact me through LinkedIN or visit the JMS Textservice website at www.jmstext.nl
